Nightlight::

Nighlight crept backwards quickly as she could.  she fell several 
feet from door in that way that door couldn't hurt her. by Several 
seconds light annoyed her optics that she tried to cover her heard 
with one wing.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He stops slamming into the door when his arm begins 
throbbing.  "If 
> anyone's in there stand back from the door."  He waits a full 
minute before 
> drawing his staff and slashing at the door.
